授業目的: To enable students to communicate smoothly in English.
到達目標: To enable students to communicate smoothly in English.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This is a practical class. The teacher is there to help and guide but it is only by actively studying at home that students will benefit and improve. It is therefore a student-centered class.

第1回:
Introduction to the course. Explanation of the syllabus. Information gap activity.
General vocabulary assessment.
第2回:
Start work on Unit 1. Focus on talking about health and health-related issues.
Get information about classmates through a mini-survey.
第3回:
Continue work on Unit 1. Focus on discussing difficult health issues.
Do extemporaneous speaking practice 01.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Share your journal contents with classmates.
第4回:
Start work on Unit 2. Focus on discussing issues related to diet and vegetarianism.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Extemporaneous speaking practice 02.
Share your journal contents with classmates.
第5回:
Continue work on Unit 2. Focus on discussing issues related to animal rights and raising animals for food.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Extemporaneous speaking evaluation 01.
Share your journal contents with classmates (time permitting).
第6回:
Start work on Unit 3. Focus on giving opinions about fashion.
Do an information gap activity about fashion.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Extemporaneous speaking practice 03.
Share your journal contents with classmates (time permitting).
第7回:
Continue work on Unit 3. Focus on discussing how fashion is related to one's image.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Short Written Quiz 01 about textbook and class expressions.
Share your journal contents with classmates (time permitting).
第8回:
Start work on Unit 4. Focus on talking about families.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Extemporaneous speaking practice 04.
Share your journal contents with classmates.
第9回:
Continue work on Unit 4. Practice discussing difficult family issues.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Extemporaneous speaking practice 05.
Share your journal contents with classmates (time permitting).
第10回:
Start work on Unit 5. Practice talking about cultural differences.
Extemporaneous Speaking Evaluation 02.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Share your journal contents with classmates (time permitting).
第11回:
Continue work on Unit 5. Focus on discussing cultural preservation.
Extemporaneous speaking practice 06.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Share your journal contents with classmates.
第12回:
Start work on Unit 6. Focus on discussing love and emotions.
Extemporaneous speaking practice 07.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Share your journal contents with classmates.
第13回:
Continue work on Unit 6. Focus on discussing topics related to marriage.
Practice chatting about daily life.
Short Written Quiz 02 about textbook and class expressions.
Share your journal contents with classmates (time permitting).
第14回:
Extemporaneous Speaking Evaluation 03.
Debriefing about what you learned during the semester.
トピック.授業外学習2: Prepare by writing your journal. Each week you will be asked to write a page on a topic. It is important that you do this.
